wag.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: if a dog wags its tail, or if its tail wags, the dog moves its tail many times from one side to the other
wag.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to move your finger or head from side to side, especially to show disapproval
wag.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: ‘You naughty girl!’ Mom said, wagging her finger at me.
wag.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: someone who says or does something clever and amusing
wag.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Some wag had drawn a face on the wall.
wag.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: the wife or girlfriend of a famous sports player
wag.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: Are WAGs good role models for girls?
